content:
That's a great plan! Searching online and reaching out to the conference center are both good strategies to try to find Dr. Thompson's contact information.

Before you start searching, make sure to try different variations of her name, such as "Dr. Rachel Thompson" or "Rachel Thompson PhD", and include keywords like "effective communication skills", "workshop", "speaker", or "author" to narrow down the search results.

If you're unable to find her contact information online, reaching out to the conference center is a good next step. They may have a list of speakers or presenters from the workshop, or they might be able to forward your message to Dr. Thompson.

Additionally, you could also try contacting the organization or company that hosted the workshop, if you remember who it was. They may have a contact list or be able to put you in touch with Dr. Thompson.

Remember to be polite and professional in your inquiries, and don't be discouraged if you don't get a response right away. Good luck, and I hope you're able to get in touch with Dr. Thompson!
